subject: RE: Lion Website - Homepage Redesign
preview: Hi Andy,  I hope to have the website fully launched before the end of February, so no problem at all working on this in January 😊  FYI I will be on leave from 22 Dec - 12 Jan and will respond to an

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy,

I hope to have the website fully launched before the end of February, so no problem at all working on this in January 😊

FYI I will be on leave from 22 Dec - 12 Jan and will respond to any enquiries upon my return.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211


CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. Any unauthorised review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.

Hi Bonnie,

Confirming we have received the completed product list and navigation mapping.

Our team is currently reviewing the file and the logic for the variation toggles and descriptions as you outlined.

I wanted to check if you have a specific deadline for this as our office closes tomorrow (Friday, December 19th) for the holiday break?

We will be back on Monday, January 5th, to continue the full build-out.

Thanks,
Andy

action.text: Adriane Roa moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Joy,

Hope you've been well!

We have completed the product list and navigation mapping for the Lion products. Please download the file here and ensure all filters are cleared before you start.

Essentially what will happen when navigating through by category > subcategory:
  1. the next step that will happen is customers will see Variation #1 relevant to the sub-category they have selected.
  2. The Description will appear on the product page that loads
  3. Variation #2 will be shown within that product page so customers can toggle between each variation
    1. The product Description, specs and further information should change with each selection

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

0408 331 966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

👉 View product list

Looking forward to your update soon!

Hope you're doing well!

Just a quick update-our team is still working on the development of the Lion pages, and we'll share the next round of progress with you next week.

In the meantime, feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Wishing you a lovely weekend!

Thanks,
Joy

Hi Bonnie,

Happy Friday!

Thanks so much-really appreciate the update.

Just a quick note to say:

  1. We'll share an update on staging progress next week so you have a clear view of where things stand.
  2. Absolutely, we can add a 'Manuals' section under product specifications. Feel free to send the files over, and we'll add them to the relevant product pages.

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like us to include or adjust-always happy to help!

Thanks,
Joy

Before we proceed with the website development, we will need you to confirm the pages that we need to develop.

Would you like me to share with you a sitemap of the current pages and products in https://lion.net.au/ so you can check which pages to keep, or do we import all live pages and products to the new website?

Looking forward to your thoughts very soon.

Thanks,
Joy

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, September 16, 2025 2:55 AM
To: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Joy T. <joy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne B. <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Lion Website - Homepage Redesign

Hi Bonnie,

Hope you had a great weekend!

Sure thing - just to make sure we capture everything correctly, could you confirm:

  1. Do you have a preference on layout (e.g. closer to your existing category pages, or more of a standalone landing-page style)? The product page should fall under the 'Offroad 4X4' category
  2. Should we use the updated darker theme from the homepage design for consistency? Let's go with a lighter theme as a few of our competitors have dark product pages
  3. Any specific calls-to-action you'd like included (e.g. "Enquire Now," "Buy Online," "Download Spec Sheet")? This product will be available on the Mitre 10 website in the near future. Ideally, we'd have a 'buy now' CTA that, when clicked, goes straight to the product page on Mitre 10's website. In the meantime, can you please add the button without any link.
  4. When is your internal presentation scheduled, so we can ensure you have the design in time? On the 30th of September

Once we have your direction on those points, our designer will finalise the mock-up for your review.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Mon, Sep 15, 2025 at 11:16 AM Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy,

Hope you've been well.

Are you able to have a Lion product page mocked up, please? We would like to present this internally.

Product information:

Portable air, power, light

COMPRESSOR - LXOF100P1

Images Download Link

Product Name: 6-in-1 Cordless Air Compressor

SKU: LXOF100P1

The LION 6-in-1 Cordless Air Compressor is the ultimate portable solution for air, power, and light on the go. Designed with versatility and convenience in mind, this compact device combines a powerful air compressor, digital tyre gauge, tyre inflator, power bank, LED light, ball pump, and bike pump-all in one.

With its large 6000mAh rechargeable battery, the LXOF100P1 operates independently of any external power source, making it perfect for road trips, outdoor adventures, or emergencies. The digital interface with 5 smart modes ensures accurate inflation with presets and auto shut-off, while the built-in power bank and USB port keep your devices charged when you need them most. An integrated LED light provides added visibility and safety in low-light conditions.

Whether it's inflating car tyres, motorcycle tyres, bicycle tyres, or sports balls, the LION 6-in-1 Cordless Air Compressor delivers reliable performance, convenience, and peace of mind-anytime, anywhere.

Key Features:

  • Multi-function air compressor with multiple nozzles and ball adapter
  • Cordless and rechargeable (6000mAh power storage)
  • Digital display with presets and auto shut-off
  • Built-in power bank with USB charging
  • Integrated LED light for emergencies
  • Compact, durable design for everyday use

Specifications:

  • Model: LXOF100P1
  • Capacity: 6000mAh
  • Ideal for tyres, balls, and small inflatables

Born to Roam. Built to Last. Choose LION.

Features & Benefits

Multi-Function Air Compressor

Inflates tyres, balls, and more-includes multiple nozzles and a ball inflator adapter.

Cordless & Rechargeable (6000mAh Power Storage)

Operates independently of any external power source-fully charge before departure for on-demand inflation and device charging.

Digital Interface with 5 Smart Modes

Digital display with presets and auto shut-off for accurate inflation.

Built-In Power Bank & USB Charging

Keeps small devices powered up

Integrated LED Light

Built-in LED light improves visibility during low-light emergencies.

Thank you

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager
